messages.subject: About the "When Humor Isn't Funny" Page...
messages.msgSnippet: I thought you might like this, and I wanted to share. : ) I was looking at the When Humor Isn t Funny page on your site (http://sandradodd.com/notfunny) and my
messages.messageBody:
I thought you might like this, and I wanted to share. : )

I was looking at the When Humor Isn't Funny page on your site
(http://sandradodd.com/notfunny) and my youngest dd came up and looked
over my shoulder and saw the picture there (bird holding a sign which
says Raising Children is like being pecked to death by a Chicken), she
read it, and said, "Uh!", very offended. I asked her if it was
insulting to her, and she said, "Yes." Then she put her arms around my
neck, sat down on my lap and started giving me little kisses on my
neck. I laughed and asked if she was pecking me to death...and yes,
she was. <G>

I LOVE unschooling!

Ria
